title: 79/48/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 December 1978 approving the plan for the eradication of leucosis submitted by the Federal Republic of Germany (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 8 December 1978  approving the plan for the eradication of leucosis submitted by the Federal Republic of Germany  (Only the German text is authentic)  (79/48/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The plan for the eradication of leucosis as applied by the Federal Republic of Germany from 1 June 1978 is hereby approved.
Financial participation by the Community shall be in respect of eligible expenditure on account of slaughterings taking place on or after 1 June 1978.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 December 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 145, 13.6.1977, p. 44. (2)OJ No L 15, 19.1.1978, p. 34.
